HERO.TEXT: Magnora blends modern luxury with ancient energy — jewelry for those who wear their ambition with intention.

ABOUT.TEXT_1: Magnora is a name born from two powerful roots: Magna – Latin for greatness and strength, Ora – Meaning energy, aura, life force.
ABOUT.TEXT_2: Together, Magnora represents a brand that transforms luxury jewelry into energetic symbols of power, success, and inner strength.
ABOUT.TEXT_3: Every piece is more than an accessory — it’s a code, carrying purpose and transformation for those who lead with vision.

COLLECTIONS.TEXT_2: Explore our curated collection of energy-infused designs.
COLLECTIONS.TEXT_3: Crafted to elevate your presence and reflect your inner strength.
COLLECTIONS.TEXT_4: Every piece in our collection is more than an accessory — it’s a reflection of what you’re calling into your life.
COLLECTIONS.TEXT_5: Power, protection, love, clarity — what are you drawn to today?

CTA.TITLE: Find Your Power?
CTA.TEXT: Each piece is more than a design — it’s an intention. Find the one that aligns with your strength, focus, and purpose.

SERVICES.TITLE: Magnora’s Services
SERVICES.TEXT: Discover the offerings that make Magnora more than a jewelry brand — from custom pieces to personalized guidance, each service is designed to support your journey.

PRODUCT_1.TITLE: Energy-Infused Jewelry Collections
PRODUCT_1.TEXT: High-end pieces made with natural crystals and symbols — each designed to attract love, clarity, or protection.

PRODUCT_2.TITLE: Custom Order & Intent-Based Design
PRODUCT_2.TEXT: We craft custom pieces aligned with your energy and personal story.

PRODUCT_3.TITLE: Gifting & Energetic Packaging
PRODUCT_3.TEXT: Each order is beautifully packaged and energetically cleansed — a gift with meaning.

PRODUCT_4.TITLE: Symbol & Stone Consultation
PRODUCT_4.TEXT: Not sure what to choose? We help you find the energy that fits your journey.

QA.TITLE: What You Seek to Know, We’re Here to Share
QA.TEXT: We’ve answered your most common questions — so you can shop with clarity and intention.

QUESTION_1.TITLE: How much does a website cost?
QUESTION_1.TEXT: Pricing depends on the project’s scope, features, and complexity. After a discovery call, we provide a custom quote tailored to your needs — no hidden fees, just transparent pricing.

CTA.TEXT: If your question wasn’t answered, we’ll guide you directly.

HERO.TEXT_1: Zenora is more than jewelry — it’s an energetic code. Discover pieces designed to align you with strength, love, success, and protection.
HERO.TEXT_2: Each Zenora collection blends sacred symbols, natural crystals, and purpose-driven design — timeless tools to align your energy and transform your reality.

SUB.TITLE: Zenora Crystal Collections
SUB.TEXT_1: Jewelry crafted from high-vibration crystals and infused with ancient feminine energy.
SUB.TEXT_2: Each collection channels specific intentions like love, intuition, protection, and abundance.

CTA.TITLE: Not Sure What You Need? Let’s Discover It Together.
CTA.TEXT: Book a consultation to find the crystal, symbol, or intention that aligns with your path — guided with care and clarity.

HERO.TEXT: Zenora is where sacred symbols, natural crystals, and soft intention meet — to bring balance, clarity, and peace to your everyday life.

ABOUT.TEXT_1: Zenora is inspired by the calming philosophy of Zen and the gentle power of the Aura — your energetic field.
ABOUT.TEXT_2: Zenora creates jewelry that helps you reconnect with your inner self — through nature’s energy, ancient wisdom, and mindful design.
ABOUT.TEXT_3: Each piece is crafted with natural crystals and spiritual symbols that bring emotional clarity, chakra alignment, and a deeper sense of presence.

PRODUCT_1.TITLE: Healing Jewelry Collections
PRODUCT_1.TEXT: High-vibration designs crafted with crystals and symbols — made to restore balance, peace, and intuitive flow.

PRODUCT_2.TITLE: Custom Intent Jewelry
PRODUCT_2.TEXT: We accept custom orders based on your energy, intention, or chakra needs — designed for your journey, your healing.

PRODUCT_3.TITLE: Energy & Chakra Guidance
PRODUCT_3.TEXT: Not sure what to choose? We guide you to the crystals and symbols that match your emotional state and spiritual goals.

PRODUCT_4.TITLE: Cleansed Gifting Experience
PRODUCT_4.TEXT: Every piece is packed with care and energy-cleansed — perfect for gifting calm, love, or a moment of self-reflection.

QA.TEXT: Have questions about our pieces, their energy, or how to choose your own? We’re here to guide you.

QUESTION_1.TEXT: Zenora pieces are designed with natural stones and sacred meaning. They aren’t just beautiful — they’re made to support healing, balance, and personal growth.
